name: `website` AND `contact:website` on (Swiss) things
description:
Here are things tagged with *both* `website` and `contact:website`, often duplicating data.

Since iD doesn't nicely show the `contact:*` scheme in the GUI, this can lead to stale information when information is 'hidden' in those tags.
Correct (only) doubly-tagged information and (like suggested [on the OSM Wiki](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:contact)) merge the information in the shorter key.

If the website doesn't follow the correct [format](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:website#Format), you should also correct it.
